name: com.example.hello
description: A sample Apache Cordova application that responds to the deviceready event.
author: Apache Cordova Team

cordova-plugin-googlemaps.LOCATION_WHEN_IN_USE_DESCRIPTION: This app wants to get your location while this app runs only.
cordova-plugin-googlemaps.LOCATION_ALWAYS_USAGE_DESCRIPTION: This app wants to get your location always, even this app runs in background.
